author: Marvel Entertainment
description:
Magic: The Gathering and East Continental Gems—Marvel’s official gemstone partner—imagine infinity in our grasp. The Infinity Gauntlet is realized in precious metals and gems—and just like the “legend rule,” there’s only one. Embedding The Soul Stone marks the glorious beginning of the MTGxMarvel story.

title: Forging the Infinity Gauntlet | Magic: The Gathering | MTGxMarvel

author: Marvel Entertainment
description:
